title: Appointment Scheduling
contents: An appointment scheduling system allows patients to book their visits in advance. This helps in distributing the patient load evenly throughout the day and reduces overcrowding during peak hours.

title: Real-Time Queue Updates
contents: Provide real-time updates on waiting times to patients. Display screens or mobile apps can inform patients about their current position in the queue and estimated waiting times, keeping them informed and reducing anxiety.

title: Clear Communication
contents: Ensure clear communication with patients regarding wait times, delays, and any changes in the schedule. Transparent and timely communication helps manage patient expectations and reduces frustration.
